verses.name: Proverbs 5:19
verses.text: Let her be as the loving hind and pleasant roe; let her breasts satisfy thee at all times; and be thou ravished always with her love.

verses.name: Proverbs 5:20
verses.text: And why wilt thou, my son, be ravished with a strange woman, and embrace the bosom of a stranger?

verses.name: Proverbs 5:21
verses.text: For the ways of man are before the eyes of the Lord, and he pondereth all his goings.

verses.name: Proverbs 5:22
verses.text: His own iniquities shall take the wicked himself, and he shall be holden with the cords of his sins.

verses.name: Proverbs 5:23
verses.text: He shall die without instruction; and in the greatness of his folly he shall go astray.
